about.description: With almost 4 years of experience as a front-end developer, I have navigated challenges while working remotely for agencies, consulting to startups, and collaborating with talented individuals to bring both enterprise and consumer digital products to life. My quiet confidence, innate curiosity, and constant dedication drive me to improve, tackling one web development problem at a time. I am committed to excellence and continuous evolution in the world of front-end development.

0.name: Jonathan Andrade
0.feedback: I had the pleasure of working with Nahum on the same software development team and I can say that he is a dedicated engineer who adapts, strives, learns and, above all, never gives up. He is a dedicated person with excellent technical skills.

1.name: Anael Hernández Rivera
1.feedback: Nahum is a very responsible and dedicated person in his work. He is someone who will always make you smile and treat you in a friendly way. He has great skill and experience in the world of UI development and frontend skills.

2.name: Aaron Estrada
2.feedback: A flexible young man who adapts to the needs of his client. An excellent companion. A professional with strong frontend skills with very good communication skills.

3.name: Amanda Corea
3.feedback: Nahum is an excellent animator and easy to work with. He is innovative, always studying the latest technique, consistent in returning a quality product, and a hard worker who will go above and beyond.
